titleStmt.title: The unfortunate lover; or, Merry Andrew's sad and wofull [sic] lamentation for the loss of his sweetheart Joan. To the tune of, I marry and thank ye too. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby. J. Deacon. J. Blare. J. Back.,

notesStmt.note: Place and Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "Alas I am come to town ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

person.persName: P. Brooksby. J. Deacon. J. Blare. J. Back.
